event_description: Apple reported record Q2 2021 earnings on April 28, 2021, with revenue of $89.6 billion, up 54% year-over-year. iPhone sales reached $47.9 billion, and Services revenue grew to $16.7 billion. The company also announced a $90 billion share repurchase program and a 7% increase in its quarterly dividend.

Epic Games' antitrust lawsuit against Apple began its trial on May 3, 2021. The lawsuit challenges Apple's App Store policies, including its 30% commission on in-app purchases and restrictions on alternative payment systems. The trial involved testimony from key executives from both companies.
